refnamediv.refpurpose: Importer of O/D-matrices for the microscopic road traffic simulation SUMO.

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: od2trips obtains a network generated from a Vissim or a Visum-network and a set of od-files stored in Vissim/Visum format. This information is used to generate single vehicle trips by dividing the od-matrix into the amounts of vehicles with a certain origin and destination and writing each of such vehicle trip information into the named output file.

refsect1.title: OPTIONS
refsect1.para: In the following, all possible options are presented.

Please remark, that the configuration-option may be used to supply a file that contains all other parameter's definition. Please take a look into the SUMO user documentation for further information about the usage of configuration files.

Path to OD input files *.fma. Optional, type:filename, default: none
Defines the name of the file to write the computed trips into. Mandatory, type:filename, default: none
A scaling value the O/D-matrix is scaled with. This value is not depending on values stored within the matrix. Optional (pregiven), type:float, default: 1
Disables color building. Optional (pregiven), type:bool, default: false
A virtual time to specify the begin of route computation. Previous routes are skipped. Optional (pregiven), type:int, default: 0

Initialises the random number generator with the current time (in ms) in the hope to make him generate really random numbers of an unknown order. Optional, type:bool, default: false

Prints some information about the process during execution. Optional, type:bool, default: false
No warnings will be prompted if this option is set. Optional, type:bool, default: false

All outputs (messages, warnings, and errors) will be written to <LOG_FILE_NAME>. Optional, type:filename, default: none
